title: Trofo
author: Trofo
created_time: May 04, 2023, 02:19:24 PMLast edit: July 03, 2023, 08:31:54 AM by Trofo
content: Coinslotty.com, an online casino for crypto enthusiasts, is happy to start with their signature campaign on Bitcointalk forum!Coinslotty has gone through a rebranding phase and new signatures and a new ANN thread have been created with the help of Bitcointalk members.After successfully managing Coinslotty's review campaign, Cro2 team will be in charge of the sig campaign as well.For more info about Coinslotty please visit the newly rebranded ANN thread.To check your weekly status please consult our campaign sheet here.Campaign information:The initial duration of the campaign is 12 weeks. The funds for the whole duration of the campaign are already on a multisig wallet controlled by Cro2 team.The campaign will last for as long as the funds on the escrow wallet are available, so it might be more or less than initially planned due to BTC price fluctuations.The continuation of the campaign will depend on some metrics Coinslotty team will be checking, so the campaign might be extended further if the team will be happy with the results.Regular campaign payments will be sent to submitted users’ BTC wallets (SegWit) on Sunday for that week’s posts.Eligibility and payment terms:We will accept 5 Legendary/Hero members and 5 Sr. Member participants.Heavy focus will be on the German local board, 5 members in total will be taken from these boards.The payrates are as follows:Hero Member, Legendary and Staff = 4$ per post => max 25 posts equaling 100$ per weekSr. Member = 3,5$ per post => max 20 posts equaling 70$ per weekBonus rewards:Each user will have their own affiliate link. Based on the incoming traffic, we will reward 200$ per month to members through whose link the platform receives the most deposits in that month. Rewards will be split in the following way:1 – 100 $2 – 70 $3 – 30 $We do encourage you to tell as many people about the newly rebranded Coinslotty casino, but please do not use your own links for multiaccounting/false traffic generating. Coinslotty team will catch you if you do, you will be removed from the campaign without payment and be red-tagged.Rules:1. You do not have to wear signature and avatar while applying but removing either at any point during the duration of the campaign will get you removed without any payment.2. Modifying your signatures or using custom URL’s is not allowed. Each of the selected participants will receive their unique URL.3. There is no minimum number of posts that need to be written. We will pay up to 25 (20) posts per week, depending on forum rank. Cut-off time is Sunday at 8PM forum time.4. Posts that aren't in proper English, aren't constructive or are under 150 characters long will not be counted. Local boards are excluded from that rule but posts written there will be checked by Google Translate and will be disqualified if they are low-quality or spam.5. We will accept max 30% of posts in Local threads (example: if you wrote 15 posts and 7 of them are in Local threads, we will accept only 2 – because 8 posts are in English and 30% extra amounts to 2.4). This does not apply to the German board, we will accept all posts written there. Cryptofrka is semi-fluent in German so quality of your posts will be checked for sure.6. Posts in Altcoin boards, Archival, Games and Rounds, Investor Based Games, Micro Earnings, Politics and Society and Off-topic will not count, as well as posts written in topics where no signatures are visible.7. The posting quality will be thoroughly checked – posts in spam mega threads, campaign threads (including this one), necro posts and low-quality posts will not be counted.8. Expect detailed post control and if you are aiming for maximum payment plan to write a few posts above the maximum quota to be sure 25 will be accepted.9. Spamming or burst posting will cause you to be removed without payment. Maximum of 5 (4) posts per day will be paid, depending on your forum rank.10. We reserve the right to disqualify any post, for any reason towards payment. If needed, we will provide evidence as to why the posts weren’t accepted. It will be done publicly if challenged, to provide all campaign members with a clear understanding of what kind of quality the campaign requires.11. Enrolling multiple accounts will result in all your accounts removed without payment, and all accounts will be flagged. Receiving negative trust feedback from DT1 or DT2 users may cause you to be removed without payment.12. We encourage all users to report cheating and if the reports turn out to be correct, a bonus of 100$ will be paid to the person who provided indisputable evidence of cheating.13. We reserve the right to remove anyone, for any reason, at any given time from the campaign or to change the rules of the signature campaign at any point. We do however guarantee that the campaign will last for as long as the escrowed funds are not spent with no big changes in general campaign rules.14. Any changes in campaign rules will be clearly communicated to all enrolled members.15. If accepted, it is your responsibility to check the details in the spreadsheet. Providing inaccurate data or incorrect BTC address might mean you will not receive payment.16. Gambling topics (especially casino related threads) are naturally of most interest to our client and users that were posting in these sections before campaign started will have priority during selection.SIGNATURESSig Code for Hero - Legendary Member                  ▄██▌                ▄████▌               ██████▌          ▄▄▄▄███▀▀██      ▄▄██████████████▄▄
